description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1. Quality Strategy planning & management
              
              - Reinforce & maintain quality strategy.
              
              - Mastering the technical specifications of the product
              
              - Evaluate, analyze and find out the solution for troubles in order to improve quality control works and satisfy customers.
              
              - Working directly with customer for any issue relate to product’s quality
              
              - Establish a training plan for Quality systems & methods and ensure training is conducted with relevant personnel
              
              - Lead the QA team and proactively influence the overall organization to maintain the Quality focus
              
              - Drive Quality cost savings within operations
              

              2. Auditing
              
              - Audits preparation and accomplish internal audit
              
              - Plan, organize and conduct employee training on Quality topics
              
              - Ensure quality standards in the production applying regular product and process audits
              

              3. Quality tools:
              
              - 5 core tools (PFMEA, SPC, MSA, APQP, PPAP )
              
              - Satisfy customer requirement ("SPC", "CPK";– process efficiency)
              
              - 8D report , PPK, PPM
              
              - React fast and appropriate to customer complaints e.g. 8D report, communication to customer
              
              - Conduct root cause analysis in cooperation with the production e.g. 5-Why questions
              
              - Implement countermeasures and ensure FMEA update
              
              - Introduce new quality tools if needed
              

              Workplace: KCN Mỹ Phước 3, phường Thới Hòa, Bến Cát, Bình Dương
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1. University degree qualification– Ideally Mechanical Engineering - Fabrication / Installation, Automobiles – Motorcycles.
              
              2. Experience of process audit by customer in automobile manufacture company
              
              3. Experience of building quality system.
              
              4. Minimum 05 years QA manager experience.
              
              5. Excellent Written & Verbal English is a must.
              
              6. Good communication skills
              
              7. Very good general management and great eye for detail
              
              8. Must have a passion for quality systems, documentation and continuous improvement.
              
              9. Self-sufficient & resourceful management caliber individual, ready to take charge of a newly established but growing technical department.
              
              10. Priority for candidates with experience of system TS16949
              
              11. Using CMM, roughness, shape tester
              
              12. Internal audit certificate
              
              13. Priority for candidate who is living in Binh Duong.
              

              Salary Range: <25,000,000> – <28,000,000>
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
